component.name: ClipShow
component.summary: Automatic highlight reel generator from video clips

description.p: ClipShow turns raw video clips into a highlight reel automatically. It detects interesting moments using scene changes, audio peaks, motion, and optional AI-powered content analysis, then stitches them together.

Features include adjustable detection weights, custom semantic text prompts for CLIP-based content scoring, face/emotion detection, a four-step GUI workflow (Import, Analyze, Review, Export), and a headless CLI mode for batch processing.
Initial release with scene, audio, motion, semantic, and emotion detectors.
